sourcesContent: import React, { useContext, useState } from "react"; import LayoutContext from "../context/layout/LayoutContext"; //import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' const AddLayout = () => { const context = useContext(LayoutContext); const [layout, setLayout] = useState({ productName: "", sku: "", category: "", size: "", color: "", sDiscription: "", lDescription: "", phone: "", files:"" }); const { addLayouts } = context; //let navigate = useNavigate() const handleClic = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); addLayouts( layout.productName, layout.sku, layout.category, layout.size, layout.color, layout.sDiscription, layout.lDescription, layout.phone, layout.files ); setLayout({ productName: "", sku: "", category: "", size: "", color: "", sDiscription: "", lDescription: "", phone: "", files:"" }); // navigate("/Layout2"); }; const onChange = (e) => { setLayout({ ...layout, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; console.log(layout,10); return (
